tool_description: Retrieve information about the world's universities & colleges.
name: Universities and Colleges
title: Universities and Colleges

api_list.name: Universities

optional_parameters.name: search
optional_parameters.description: Filter results by searching / autocompleting the name value.

optional_parameters.name: includeUniversityDetails
optional_parameters.description: Include additional university details such as school colors, mascot, website, address, and more. Including details costs $0.01. Default value is false.

api_list.name: University Details by Id
api_list.description: Retrieve a single university by ID. Automatically includes any available University details (University details cost $0.01 if additional details like school colors, mascot, website, address, and more are present in response).
